meanings.definition: The quality or state of being spherical.
meanings.sent1: The sphericity of the ball made it perfect for rolling.
meanings.sent2: The artist admired the sphericity of the marble sculpture.
meanings.sent3: The sphericity of the watermelon caused it to roll away comically.
meanings.sent4: The sphericity of the moon in the night sky was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent5: Children were fascinated by the sphericity of the bouncy ball.

meanings.definition: The roundness or curvature of a sphere.
meanings.sent1: The planet's sphericity was evident from space.
meanings.sent2: The sphericity of the basketball made it bounce predictably.
meanings.sent3: The sphericity of the cake made it look like a perfect dome.
meanings.sent4: The sphericity of the crystal ball symbolized clarity and focus.
meanings.sent5: The sphericity of the Earth is crucial for its gravitational pull.
